channel.title: COVID-19 Student Response
channel.description: Recent content on COVID-19 Student Response

item.title: Community Activism Initiatives
item.description: Non-Clinical Support for Healthcare Workers Student in Boston? Interested in reducing the effects of COVID-19 and flattening the curve?

item.title: PPE Shortage Initiative
item.description: HMS PPE Shortage Initiative The shortage of personal protective equipment (PPE) is already affecting our medical workers ability to protect themselves, our patients, and our public.

item.title: Health Literacy Project
item.description: The COVID-19 Health Literacy Project was started by Pooja Chandrashekar, a first-year medical student at Harvard Medical School, and quickly expanded into a national coalition of over 150 medical students representing over 35 institutions and 34 languages.
